title: help
body: I'm in a VERY bad mood i can' get on my old acc if you cant fix it plz give me my money back

replies.body: Not being able to recover an old account would certainly put me in an unpleasant mood too, so I'd like to help find it!  To start, I recommend using the [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide, and going over each step to discover and recover your old account.  Hopefully that will do the trick, but let me know.

Maybe someone hacked your account and changed your password. Does anyone else know your password besides you or is it something that's very easy to guess? If you did that fake Christmas scam thing then they might have gotten into your account from that. That's your fault though then if you fell for a scam/hacker's tricks.
i did not use it and my pass word is very hard and my brother to stupid to change  password
